Selected Answer: B

Selected Answer: B
Default: 43200 seconds (12 hours)

Ans: B

Graceful Restart Timer: default is 12hours (43200 sec)

Specify how often the OMP information cache is flushed and refreshed. A timer value of 0 disables OMP graceful restart.

Range: 0 through 604800 seconds (168 hours, or 7 days) Default: 43200 seconds (12 hours)

https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/routers/sdwan/configuration/routing/vEdge-20-x/routing-book/m-unicast-routing.html#concept_rjl_sc2_b3b

OMP Graceful restart default value is always set at 12 hours (43,200 seconds)

Option [B]

questions.question_text: Which routing protocol is used to exchange control plane information between vSmart controllers and WAN Edge routers in the Cisco SD-WAN secure extensible network?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A
Queue 0 = Low Latency for Voice

Queue 0 is reserved for Low Latency Traffic or (LLQ) in other words voice traffic.
Queues 1-7 are available for data traffic.

Option [A]

Link Reference:-
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/routers/vedge-router/213408-implement-qos-in-cisco-sd-wan.html

Selected Answer: A
Voice should be placed in LLQ then queue 0.

How must the application-aware enterprise firewall policies be applied within the same WAN Edge router?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Important point in a question is "within the same WAN edge router", hence the answer should be A.

Selected Answer: A
A - think is right
I see everywhere on cisco papers notes only about zone-pairs

Selected Answer: A
Zone pairâ€”A container that associates a source zone with a destination zone and that applies a firewall policy to the traffic that flows between the two zones.

B is correct 
Cisco's Enterprise Application-Aware Firewall can perform intra-zone-based firewalling and inter-zone-based firewalling based on zone pair association and traffic flow between zones.

comments.content: I agree, the word "within" seems to make B wrong.
wouldn't that be A then, between a zone pair? You don't do it within the same zone

discussion.content:
Answer [B]
Within and between the two zones.

In Summary
Traffic flows that originate in a given zones are allowed to proceed to another zone based on the policy between the two zones. Grouping VPNs into zones allows you to establish security boundaries in your overlay network so that you can control all data traffic that passes between zones.

White Paper Link:-
https://www.cisco.com/c/dam/en/us/td/docs/solutions/CVD/SDWAN/sdwan-firewall-compliance-deploy-guide-2020sep.pdf
